page.title: 09THE CHURCH AT NEWLANDS
page.content: ALTHOUGH NEWLANDS CHURCH IS JUST OUTSIDE OUR GRID OF STUDY, IT PLAYS AN IMPORTANT PART IN OUR COMMUNITY. WE NOW HAVE A NEW MINISTER. HE DOES 4 PARISHES INCLUDING OURS. HE IS ALSO OUR SCHOOL CHAPLAIN. IN OUR CHURCH WE HAVE SUNDAY SCHOOL AND A YOUTH GROUP, WHICH IS JUST LIKE SUNDAY SCHOOL BUT FOR OLDER CHILDREN. IT IS RUN BY A LOCAL MUM AND DAD. WE ALSO HAVE THE WOMEN'S GUILD FOR THE WOMEN OF OUR PARISH. THEY HAVE LOTS OF ACTIVITIES, INCULDING COOKERY, SEWING AND CRAFTS AND FILM SHOWS. IN MAY WE HAVE CHRISTIAN AID WEEK, WHICH WE ALSO SUPPORT. WE HAVE A FETE, SPONSORED WALK AND A DANCE. WE ALL TAKE PART IN THESE THINGS. WE RAISE QUITE A LOT OF MONEY FOR THE APPEAL. AT THE FETE WE HAVE PONY RIDES, SIDE STALLS, TEAS AND A BARBECUE.
